parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the font for given control (see [[Fonts#Available_Fonts|Fonts]])
<br><br><u>Available Arma 3 fonts</u>
* "EtelkaMonospacePro"
* "EtelkaMonospaceProBold"
* "EtelkaNarrowMediumPro"
* "LCD14"
* "LucidaConsoleB"
* "PuristaBold"
* "PuristaLight"
* "PuristaMedium"
* "PuristaSemibold"
* "RobotoCondensed"
* "RobotoCondensedBold"
* "RobotoCondensedLight"
* "TahomaB"
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetFont''' fontName


</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  control: [[Control]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> fontName: [[String]] - one of the fonts defined in CfgFontFamilies</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetFont]] "TahomaB"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Fonts#Available_Fonts|Fonts]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
